title: Data is corrupt

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Every time when i turned off LOL and click on a League of legends icon the window pop-up saying...
"Data is corrupt. Your League of Legends files are corrupt. A repair will be started to address the issue. If you continue the experience this issue, please contact Player Support."

Any help? please. I have to reinstall game every day. can somebody help me. Its happening at new patch..

THX MUCH BOIZ::!!::

replies.body:
Yeeeaaaa that definitely shouldn't be happening every single time you close or launch League. Let's make sure that you're getting a full fresh install of the game by using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool). 

Run that tool with the options **reinstall and clean uninstall** turned on and that should be able to fully wipe any corrupted files from your system to prepare for a fresh install.
doesn't work for me, play help me i haven't played lol for weeks
Hi i've run into this problem also and tried the repair tool but it crashes also so what do I do.
Same, I just have to uninstall and copy the files from a friend, what a ridiculous error, Hextech repair tool doesnt work anyway, do something rito!{{sticker:darius-angry}}

Go to Hextech Repair Tool:
Game--->[x]check box Reinstall--->[X] check box clean uninstall (not recommended,
Just wait for the process then your done!
It happened to me just this morning and trying to figured it out...no solutions yet :/
